Welcome to the GitHub page of our survey research study entitled Open-mindedness in the Political Arena!    
   
The purpose of this study is an examination of the associations between the personality trait Openness to New Experiences and conservative/liberal self-identification and policy positions.

For further information about the Openness to New Experiences, please see <a href="https://ferol15.github.io/personalitytraits/about.html">About the Project</a> section. 

Thank you for your help, in advance. Sincerely,
